name: Edge of Detection
description:
Click Here To Play

Description

  • Edge of Detection is a 2D stealth platformer. 
  • You have a disguise that you can use to ‘fit in’ and prevent being detected by enemies, but it only lasts a few seconds and takes time to put on. 
  • This creates a gameplay dynamic where you are quickly moving while in the enemy’s line of sight (shown to you visually) and then hiding in tiny ‘blind spots’ to re-apply your disguise.
  • The fact that these blind spots are small and often temporary aims to create a tense gameplay experience, but also a satisfying sense of reward when the player manages to execute their plan.

Controls

Arrow, Z, and X keys
